<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: PreservedAnalysis should not be abused to tell if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// status of loopnest has been changed. We should use and only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use LPMUpdater for this purpose.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsLoopNestPtrValid || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>.isLoopNestChanged()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ParentLoop = OuterMostLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">          OuterMostLoop = ParentLoop;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoopNestPtr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a9f905da3130336a4fddcd7a7d3360bfd">LoopNest::getLoopNest</a>(&#42;OuterMostLoop, AR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstandardanalysisresults/#a124376878e24aef4252795ba9fea420f">SE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IsLoopNestPtrValid = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>.markLoopNestChanged(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4522d39270d83d73550a3777a2fca312">VerifySCEV</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LAR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstandardanalysisresults/#a124376878e24aef4252795ba9fea420f">SE</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#aff82c03c1ce8b945170bcb1f0f624c17">verify</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loop hasn&#39;t been deleted, we need to handle invalidation here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Updater.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#abdeee8c28f2338c206068a0ebc1607ab">skipCurrentLoop</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know that the loop pass couldn&#39;t have invalidated any other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop&#39;s analyses (that&#39;s the contract of a loop pass), so directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handle the loop analysis manager&#39;s invalidation here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a7cfe61417446ebb812e81293bde22a29">LAM</a>.invalidate(&#42;L, PassPA);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then intersect the preserved set so that invalidation of module</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// analyses will eventually occur when the module pass completes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PA.intersect(std::move(PassPA));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityworklist/#adc2ef5f0964becc28dfa58a7abc2f1e7">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation/#ab20a8985d0c6fff641ddf9b933b2a886">popBeforeNonSkippedPassCallback</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By definition we preserve the proxy. We also preserve all analyses on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loops. This precludes &#42;any&#42; invalidation of loop analyses by the proxy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but that&#39;s OK because we&#39;ve taken care to invalidate analyses in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop analysis manager incrementally above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PA.preserveSet&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allanalyseson">AllAnalysesOn&lt;Loop&gt;</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PA.preserve&lt;LoopAnalysisManagerFunctionProxy&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also preserve the set of standard analyses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PA.preserve&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreeanalysis">DominatorTreeAnalysis</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PA.preserve&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolutionanalysis">ScalarEvolutionAnalysis</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseBlockFrequencyInfo &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasProfileData())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PA.preserve&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyanalysis">BlockFrequencyAnalysis</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
